channel.title: Switzie on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce
channel.description: Recent content in Switzie on The Williams Kids – Dillan ♥ Ashley ♥ Dwyane ♥ Bruce
channel.copyright: Copyright © 2013-{year} David E. Williams. All rights reserved.

item.title: Status Update – July 22, 2019
item.description: Dillan and Bruce yearly physical, they’re good. Ashley helped wash dogs Sunday, probable allergic reaction to dog shampoo, face and everywhere covered in rash, got bad overnight, doctor checked her too, Prednisone. Boys’ first night of swim lessons, Dwyane Level 4, Bruce Level 2?

item.title: Status Update – February 2, 2019
item.description: Slept until 8! Helped Dillan do homework. Ashley piano. Took her to IGA to sell cookies, CVS for Dwyane and Lesa’s scripts, Wendy’s. Lesa took boys, dogs for walk to mailbox. Kids played inside/outside, Dillan went to Gabe’s, rest played with slime, bugged me about Wii, Monopoly.

item.title: Kid Quote of the Day – January 25, 2019
item.description: Bruce: Daddy, I like and love everyone who lives in this house. Plus God, and Jesus, and Switzie and Porter.

item.title: Status Update – April 11, 2015
item.description: Switzie went to vet. All is well. Springville Carnival. Worked beanbag toss. Kids loved bouncy house. Annie movie at Tripoli in the evening.
